snippet: Works, including some by Monet, Picasso and Renoir, were removed from the home of Cornelius Gurlitt in Salzburg, Austria, to ensure their safety.
abstract: Works, including some by Monet, Picasso and Renoir, were removed from the home of Cornelius Gurlitt in Salzburg, Austria, to ensure their safety.

headline.main: Artworks Removed From Austria Home of German Who Holds Huge Trove
headline.print_headline: An Art Cache, and Inquiries Into Looting
